revision.text:
'''Roaming Pokémon''' are rare Pokémon that can be found randomly while on routes. Each region has a set of Roaming Pokémon that can be caught. So far, only Mew and Manaphy have no requirements to appear.
=='''Odds'''== The chance to encounter a roaming Pokémon is 1/8192 for the first route of a region, and increases linearly up to 1/4096 for the last route of a region. "first" and "last" here just being the route number, not necessarily the order you reach the route
=='''Regions'''==
===Kanto=== No current requirement. * Mew
===Johto=== Complete the Burned Tower dungeon. * Raikou * Entei * Suicune
===Hoenn=== Become the Hoenn champion. * Latios * Latias * Jirachi
===Sinnoh=== No current requirement. * Manaphy Complete Fullmoon Island * Cresselia
{{Category:Unique Pokémon}}

'''Roaming Pokémon''' are rare Pokémon that can be found randomly while on routes. Each region has a set of Roaming Pokémon that can be caught. So far, only Mew and Manaphy have no requirements to appear.
=='''Odds'''== The chance to encounter a roaming Pokémon is 1/8192 for the first route of a region, and increases linearly up to 1/4096 for the last route of a region. "first" and "last" here just being the route number, not necessarily the order you reach the route
=='''Regions'''==
===Kanto=== No current requirement. * Mew
===Johto=== Complete the Burned Tower dungeon. * Raikou * Entei * Suicune
===Hoenn=== Become the Hoenn champion. * Latios * Latias * Regice * Regirock * Registeel * Jirachi
===Sinnoh=== No current requirement. * Manaphy Complete Fullmoon Island * Cresselia
{{Category:Unique Pokémon}}
